front.title: Some Comments on GMPLS and Optical Technologies

abstract.t: GMPLS [2] is being considered as an extension to the MPLS frameworkto include optical, non-packet switched technologies. This draftreviews the motivation for doing so from an end-userâ€™s perspectiveand points out some key requirements/impacts that this will have onthe extensions to the routing and label distribution/signalingprotocols.
